017package org.microbean.loader.typesafe.config;
018
019import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
020import java.io.BufferedReader;
021import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.io.InputStreamReader;
025import java.io.Reader;
026import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
027
028import java.lang.reflect.Type;
029
030import java.nio.file.Files;
031import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
032import java.nio.file.Paths;
033
034import java.util.Collection;
035import java.util.Collections;
036import java.util.Iterator;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.Objects;
040
041import java.util.function.BiFunction;
042import java.util.function.Supplier;
043
044import java.util.stream.Collectors;
045
046import com.typesafe.config.Config;
047import com.typesafe.config.ConfigBeanFactory;
048import com.typesafe.config.ConfigException;
049import com.typesafe.config.ConfigFactory;
050import com.typesafe.config.ConfigObject;
051import com.typesafe.config.ConfigParseOptions;
052import com.typesafe.config.ConfigResolveOptions;
053import com.typesafe.config.ConfigResolver;
054import com.typesafe.config.ConfigSyntax;
055import com.typesafe.config.ConfigUtil;
056import com.typesafe.config.ConfigValue;
057import com.typesafe.config.ConfigValueFactory;
058import com.typesafe.config.ConfigValueType;
059
060import org.microbean.invoke.CachingSupplier;
061import org.microbean.invoke.FixedValueSupplier;
062
063import org.microbean.loader.api.Loader;
064
065import org.microbean.loader.spi.AbstractTreeBasedProvider;
066import org.microbean.loader.spi.Value;
067
068import org.microbean.path.Path;
069import org.microbean.path.Path.Element;
070
071import org.microbean.qualifier.Qualifiers;
072
073import org.microbean.type.JavaTypes;
074
075import org.microbean.type.Type.CovariantSemantics;
076
077/**
078 * An {@link AbstractTreeBasedProvider} that uses a {@link Config} to
079 * {@linkplain #get(Loader, Path) produce} {@link Value}s.
080 *
081 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
082 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
083 *
084 * @see #get(Loader, Path)
085 */
086public class TypesafeConfigHoconProvider extends AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue> {
087
088
089  /*
090   * Instance fields.
091   */
092
093
094  private final Supplier<? extends Config> configSupplier;
095
096
097  /*
098   * Constructors.
099   */
100
101
102  /**
103   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
104   * solely from a classpath resource named {@code application.conf},
105   * using the {@link Thread#getContextClassLoader() context
106   * classloader}.
107   *
108   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
109   *
110   * @see #TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader, String)
111   */
112  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider() {
113    this(null, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), "application.conf");
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
118   * solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using
119   * the {@linkplain Thread#getContextClassLoader() context
120   * classloader}.
121   *
122   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
123   *
124   * @param resourceName the name of the classpath resource; must not
125   * be {@code null}
126   *
127   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code resourceName} is {@code
128   * null}
129   *
130   * @see #TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader, String)
131   */
132  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(final String resourceName) {
133    this(null, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), resourceName);
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
138   * solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using
139   * the supplied {@link ClassLoader}.
140   *
141   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
142   *
143   * @param cl the {@link ClassLoader}; may be {@code null} in which
144   * case the system classloader will be used instead, normally via
145   * {@link ClassLoader#getSystemResourceAsStream(String)}
146   *
147   * @param resourceName the name of the classpath resource; must not
148   * be {@code null}
149   *
150   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code resourceName} is {@code
151   * null}
152   */
153  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(final ClassLoader cl, final String resourceName) {
154    this(null, cl, resourceName);
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * Creates a new {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} that reads
159   * solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using
160   * the supplied {@link ClassLoader}.
161   *
162   * <p>No stacking of other configurations is performed.</p>
163   *
164   * @param lowerBound the {@linkplain #lowerBound() lower type bound}
165   * of this {@link TypesafeConfigHoconProvider} implementation; may
166   * be {@code null}
167   *
168   * @param cl the {@link ClassLoader}; may be {@code null} in which
169   * case the system classloader will be used instead, normally via
170   * {@link ClassLoader#getSystemResourceAsStream(String)}
171   *
172   * @param resourceName the name of the classpath resource; must not
173   * be {@code null}
174   *
175   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code resourceName} is {@code
176   * null}
177   */
178  public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(final Type lowerBound, final ClassLoader cl, final String resourceName) {
179    super(lowerBound);
180    Objects.requireNonNull(resourceName, "resourceName");
181    this.configSupplier = new CachingSupplier<>(() -> produceConfig(cl, resourceName));
182  }
183
184
185  /*
186   * Instance methods.
187   */
188
189
190  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
191  protected final boolean absent(final ConfigValue node) {
192    return node == null;
193  }
194
195  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
196  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
197  protected final ConfigValue get(final ConfigValue node, final int index) {
198    if (node == null) {
199      return null;
200    }
201    switch (node.valueType()) {
202    case LIST:
203      return ((List<? extends ConfigValue>)node).get(index);
204    case BOOLEAN:
205    case NULL:
206    case NUMBER:
207    case OBJECT:
208    case STRING:
209      return null;
210    default:
211      throw new AssertionError();
212    }
213  }
214
215  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
216  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
217  protected final ConfigValue get(final ConfigValue node, final String name) {
218    if (node == null) {
219      return null;
220    }
221    switch (node.valueType()) {
222    case OBJECT:
223      return ((Map<?, ? extends ConfigValue>)node).get(name);
224    case BOOLEAN:
225    case LIST:
226    case NULL:
227    case NUMBER:
228    case STRING:
229      return null;
230    default:
231      throw new AssertionError();
232    }
233  }
234
235  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
236  protected final boolean list(final ConfigValue node) {
237    return node != null && node.valueType() == ConfigValueType.LIST;
238  }
239
240  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
241  protected final boolean map(final ConfigValue node) {
242    return node != null && node.valueType() == ConfigValueType.OBJECT;
243  }
244
245  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
246  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
247  protected final Iterator<String> names(final ConfigValue node) {
248    if (node == null) {
249      return Collections.emptyIterator();
250    }
251    switch (node.valueType()) {
252    case OBJECT:
253      return ((Map<String, ?>)node).keySet().iterator();
254    case BOOLEAN:
255    case LIST:
256    case NULL:
257    case NUMBER:
258    case STRING:
259      return Collections.emptyIterator();
260    default:
261      throw new AssertionError();
262    }
263  }
264
265  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
266  protected final boolean nil(final ConfigValue node) {
267    return node == null || node.valueType() == ConfigValueType.NULL;
268  }
269
270  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
271  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
272  protected final ConfigValue qualifiers(final ConfigValue node) {
273    if (node == null) {
274      return null;
275    }
276    switch (node.valueType()) {
277    case OBJECT:
278      return ((Map<? extends String, ? extends ConfigValue>)node).get("@qualifiers");
279    case BOOLEAN:
280    case LIST:
281    case NULL:
282    case NUMBER:
283    case STRING:
284      return null;
285    default:
286      throw new AssertionError();
287    }
288  }
289
290  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
291  protected final int size(final ConfigValue node) {
292    if (node == null) {
293      return 0;
294    }
295    switch (node.valueType()) {
296    case OBJECT:
297      return ((Map<?, ?>)node).size();
298    case LIST:
299      return ((Collection<?>)node).size();
300    case BOOLEAN:
301    case NULL:
302    case NUMBER:
303    case STRING:
304      return 0;
305    default:
306      throw new AssertionError();
307    }
308  }
309
310  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
311  protected BiFunction<? super ConfigValue, ? super Type, ?> reader(final Loader<?> requestor,
312                                                                    final Path<? extends Type> absolutePath) {
313    final Config config = this.config();
314    assert config != null;
315    return (final ConfigValue configValue, final Type type) -> {
316      if (configValue != null) {
317        final Object unwrapped = configValue.unwrapped();
318        switch (configValue.valueType()) {
319        case BOOLEAN:
320        case LIST:
321        case NUMBER:
322        case STRING:
323          if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(type, unwrapped.getClass())) {
324            return unwrapped;
325          }
326          break;
327        case NULL:
328          return null;
329        case OBJECT:
330          try {
331            return ConfigBeanFactory.create(config, JavaTypes.erase(type));
332          } catch (final ConfigException.BadBean | ConfigException.ValidationFailed e) {
333            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(type, unwrapped.getClass())) {
334              return unwrapped;
335            }
336          }
337          break;
338        default:
339          throw new AssertionError();
340        }
341      }
342      return null;
343    };
344  }
345
346  @Override // AbstractTreeBasedProvider<ConfigValue>
347  protected ConfigValue rootNode(final Loader<?> requestor, final Path<? extends Type> absolutePath) {
348    return this.config().root();
349  }
350
351  private final Config config() {
352    return this.configSupplier.get();
353  }
354
355
356  /*
357   * Static methods.
358   */
359
360
361  private static final Config produceConfig(final ClassLoader cl, final String resourceName) {
362    final InputStream inputStream =
363      cl == null ? ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(resourceName) : cl.getResourceAsStream(resourceName);
364    Reader reader;
365    if (inputStream == null) {
366      try {
367        reader = Files.newBufferedReader(Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir", "."), resourceName));
368      } catch (final FileNotFoundException /* this probably isn't thrown */ | NoSuchFileException e) {
369        return ConfigFactory.empty();
370      } catch (final IOException ioException) {
371        throw new UncheckedIOException(ioException.getMessage(), ioException);
372      }
373    } else if (inputStream instanceof BufferedInputStream) {
374      reader = new InputStreamReader(inputStream);
375    } else {
376      reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(inputStream));
377    }
378    return ConfigFactory.parseReader(reader,
379                                     ConfigParseOptions.defaults().setSyntaxFromFilename(resourceName))
380      .resolve(ConfigResolveOptions.noSystem().appendResolver(new Resolver()));
381  }
382
383
384  /*
385   * Inner and nested classes.
386   */
387
388
389  private static final class Resolver implements ConfigResolver {
390
391    private final ConfigResolver fallback;
392
393    private Resolver() {
394      this(null);
395    }
396
397    private Resolver(final ConfigResolver fallback) {
398      super();
399      this.fallback = fallback;
400    }
401
402    @Override // ConfigResolver
403    public final ConfigValue lookup(final String path) {
404      // Called only for substitutions that are not internal to the Config.
405      return
406        ConfigValueFactory.fromAnyRef(Loader.loader()
407                                      .load(Path.of(Object.class, ConfigUtil.splitPath(path)))
408                                      .orElseGet(() -> this.fallback == null ? null : this.fallback.lookup(path)));
409    }
410
411    @Override // ConfigResolver
412    public final ConfigResolver withFallback(final ConfigResolver fallback) {
413      if (fallback == null || fallback.equals(this.fallback)) {
414        return this;
415      }
416      return new Resolver(fallback);
417    }
418
419  }
420
421}
